biotools.summary: A collection of functions to detect gene probes with different means or variances between two groups in (epi)-genomic data analysis, including classical F test and Levene's test for equal variance, likelihood ratio test for equal mean and equal variance.

bioschemas.name: diffMeanVar
bioschemas.summary: A collection of functions to detect gene probes with different means or variances between two groups in (epi)-genomic data analysis, including classical F test and Levene's test for equal variance, likelihood ratio test for equal mean and equal variance.
